description: Execute all non-optional vector search setup tasks from .kiro/specs/04-vector-search-setup/tasks.md
context: Based on conversation summary, several core services are already implemented: EmbeddingService.ts, VectorSearchService.ts, UPCLookupService.ts, HybridSearchService.ts, AllergenDetectionService.ts, DietaryComplianceService.ts, ProductRecommendationService.ts. These cover the basic vector search infrastructure, embedding generation, and core search services.

Created core RAG services: VectorIndexService for MongoDB Atlas index configuration, RAGContextService for building comprehensive analysis context, RAGService with OpenAI integration for AI-powered dietary compliance analysis, DietaryService for complete scan-to-analysis orchestration with multi-level caching, PerformanceMonitoringService for tracking metrics and cost optimization, and DemoScenariosService for hackathon presentation scenarios.

Completed remaining tasks: Created FamilyProfileService for multi-user family dietary profile management with conflict resolution, LLMCostOptimizationService for prompt optimization and batch processing to minimize API costs, and UserFeedbackService for collecting user corrections and continuous model improvement. All non-optional vector search setup tasks are now complete.
